sentences: Proposed agenda items on issues relating to small island developing states were the subject of some discussion, with parties eventually agreeing that the item should be included under the SBI agenda item on other matters (see also the COP 12 section on Adoption of the Agenda ).

Following agreement on where the issue should be discussed, short draft SBI conclusions were adopted on this issue on 14 November. SBI Conclusions: These conclusions (FCCC/SBI/2006/L.7) invite parties to take into account relevant aspects of the Mauritius Strategy and Declaration, and request a Secretariat report on how the Strategy is reflected is reflected in the work of the UNFCCC and Kyoto Protocol.
